item.title: My first time playing Contract Bridge
item.description: Summary I document my experience of playing Bridge for the first time. The Otago Bridge Club was established in 1936. We will be playing the variation of Contract Bridge known as Duplicate Bridge. Personal glossary http://github.com/mullikine/glossaries-gh/blob/master/bridge.txt Wiki glossary https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glossary%5Fof%5Fcontract%5Fbridge%5Fterms Etiquette Participants conduct themselves in a highly civilized manner. Forgive me if the full set of protocols remind me of the Soup Nazi. Soup Nazi - Newman Orders {Jumbalaya!
